LanguageData.CatalystSerum.label: catalyst serum
LanguageData.CatalystSerum.description: Disgusting slurry of medical supplies and raw meat that breaks down into a mutagenic sludge.
LanguageData.EggSlimeFertilized.label: slime egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggSlimeFertilized.description: Some strange fertilized slime egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a slime. It can be eaten.
LanguageData.EggSlimeUnfertilized.label: slime egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.EggSlimeUnfertilized.description: Some strange egg thing layed by a mutagenic slime. It can be eaten.
